features: Temperature regulation: Made with soft merino wool, this sock regulates temperature in hot or cold conditions, and provides a soft feel next to the skin.
Moisture management: Merino is combined with polypropylene to move perspiration away from the foot and ensure long-lasting comfort.
Protection and comfort: Reinforced in the tibia area, and with an elastic band under the arch, this sock stays in place and provides great comfort.
Merino wool: The highest, finest type of wool obtainable. It does not itch and is shrink treated to hold its size and shape.
Anatomical design: Designed to precisely fit human bone structures.
Ankle bone protector: Protective component over the ankle.
